column4: that installer/password bug has been patched already
soundjuicer is awful. I suggest you install grip with vorbis-tools.
awful? It's got a very high just-works factor, no extra guff, and a .ogg is a .ogg...
of course you can. Just make custom profiles, if you're really into that sort of thing.
no - gpg/pgp don't use the passphrase to generate the key
